" It 's only for a few days . "[112-lucy]

" But why at all ? "[112-lucy]

[Lucy]112-lucy was silent . [She]112-lucy was drifting away from [[her]112-lucy mother]442-her mother . It was quite easy to say , " Because [George Emerson]115-george has been bothering [me]112-lucy , and if [he]115-george hears [I]112-lucy 've given up [Cecil]198-cecil may begin again "[112-lucy] - quite easy , and it had the incidental advantage of being true . But [she]112-lucy could not say it . [She]112-lucy disliked confidences , for they might lead to self - knowledge and to that king of terrors - Light . Ever since that last evening at [Florence]14-florence [she]112-lucy had deemed it unwise to reveal [her]112-lucy soul .

[Mrs. Honeychurch]152-mrs. honeychurch , too , was silent . [She]152-mrs. honeychurch was thinking , " [[My]152-mrs. honeychurch daughter]3065-my daughter wo n't answer [me]152-mrs. honeychurch ; [she]3065-my daughter would rather be with [those inquisitive old maids]3325-those inquisitive old maids than with [Freddy]121-freddy and [me]152-mrs. honeychurch . Any rag , tag , and bobtail apparently does if [she]3065-my daughter can leave [[her]3065-my daughter [home]376-home]836-her home . "[152-mrs. honeychurch] And as in [her]152-mrs. honeychurch case thoughts never remained unspoken long , [she]152-mrs. honeychurch burst out with : " [You]3328-you 're tired of [Windy Corner]6-windy corner . "[152-mrs. honeychurch]

This was perfectly true . [Lucy]112-lucy had hoped to return to [Windy Corner]6-windy corner when [she]112-lucy escaped from [Cecil]198-cecil , but [she]112-lucy discovered that [[her]112-lucy home]836-her home existed no longer . It might exist for [Freddy]121-freddy , who still lived and thought straight , but not for one who had deliberately warped the brain . [She]112-lucy did not acknowledge that [her]112-lucy brain was warped , for the brain itself must assist in that acknowledgment , and [she]112-lucy was disordering the very instruments of life . [She]112-lucy only felt , " [I]112-lucy do not love [George]115-george ; [I]112-lucy broke off [my]112-lucy engagement because [I]112-lucy did not love [George]115-george ; [I]112-lucy must go to [Greece]94-greece because [I]112-lucy do not love [George]115-george ; it is more important that [I]112-lucy should look up gods in the dictionary than that [I]112-lucy should help [[my]112-lucy mother]2602-my mother ; [every one else]1517-every one else is behaving very badly . "[112-lucy] [She]112-lucy only felt irritable and petulant , and anxious to do what [she]112-lucy was not expected to do , and in this spirit [she]112-lucy proceeded with the conversation .

" Oh , [mother]2081-mother , what rubbish [you]2081-mother talk ! Of course [I]112-lucy 'm not tired of [Windy Corner]6-windy corner . "[112-lucy]

" Then why not say so at once , instead of considering half an hour ? "[112-lucy]

[She]112-lucy laughed faintly , " Half a minute would be nearer . "[112-lucy]

" Perhaps [you]2081-mother would like to stay away from [[your]2081-mother home]3332-your home altogether ? "[112-lucy]

" Hush , [mother]2081-mother ! [People]305-people will hear [you]112-lucy "[112-lucy] ; for [they]1926-they had entered [Mudie]102-mudie 's 's . Tears came into [[her]112-lucy mother]442-her mother 's eyes .

" [I]112-lucy 've seen [the world]2079-the world so little - [I]112-lucy felt so out of things in [Italy]11-italy . " And mess with typewriters and latch - keys , "[152-mrs. honeychurch] exploded [Mrs. Honeychurch]152-mrs. honeychurch . " [I]112-lucy want more independence , "[112-lucy] said [Lucy]112-lucy lamely ; [she]112-lucy knew that [she]112-lucy wanted something , and independence is a useful cry ; [we]1929-we can always say that [we]1929-we have not got it . [Lucy]112-lucy complained that the hood was stuffy . Chapter XX : The End of the Middle Ages

[The Miss Alans]149-the miss alans did go to [Greece]94-greece , but [they]2009-they went by [themselves]2009-they . [[They]2009-they alone of [this little company]2011-this little company]2010-they alone of this little company will double [Malea]105-malea and plough [the waters of [the Saronic gulf]2013-the saronic gulf]2012-the waters of the saronic gulf . [They]2009-they alone will visit [Athens]39-athens and [Delphi]99-delphi , and [either shrine of intellectual song]2014-either shrine of intellectual song - that upon [the Acropolis]106-the acropolis , encircled by [blue seas]2015-blue seas ; that under [Parnassus]107-parnassus , where the eagles build and [the bronze charioteer]2016-the bronze charioteer [drives undismayed towards infinity]2017-drives undismayed towards infinity . Trembling , anxious , cumbered with much digestive bread , [they]2009-they did proceed to [Constantinople]95-constantinople , [they]2009-they did go round [the world]2079-the world . [The rest of [us]2020-us]2019-the rest of us must be contented with a fair , but a less arduous , goal . Italiam petimus : [we]2020-us return to [the Pension Bertolini]536-the pension bertolini .

[George]115-george said it was [[his]115-george old room]2022-his old room .

[He]115-george was [a boy]2603-a boy after all . " [Signorino]291-signorino , [domani faremo]3475-domani faremo - "[2042-they]

" Look at the lights going over [the bridge]612-the bridge . "[2042-they]

" But [this room]3479-this room reminds [me]2045-me of [Charlotte]111-miss bartlett . How horrible to grow old in [[Charlotte]111-miss bartlett 's way]3480-charlotte 's way ! [Youth]214-youth enwrapped [them]214-youth ; the song of [Phaethon]183-phaethon announced passion requited , love attained . But [they]214-youth were conscious of a love more mysterious than this .
